body.p: Use Cadence Pegasus FastXOR* to compare two layout views/GDS files.
This section compares the GDS file with the layout_extract view of a cell.

ol.li: Open the following cell/view in read mode:Lib/Cell/View: ldk_demo_lib /i0mbfn000aa1d48x5 /layout_extract

From the Layout menu, select Pegasus > Run FastXOR…
Opening Cadence Pegasus FastXOR*

The Cadence Pegasus FastXOR* Run Submission form displays (Figure 63).
In the Run Data section of the form, in the Run Directory field, specify FAST_XOR. Pegasus FastXOR* form - Run Data section

In the Input section, in the Layout1region, ensure the correct lib/cell/view is selected as highlighted in Figure 64 (this auto-populates because we launched Cadence Pegasus FastXOR* from the same Layout view).
In the Layout2 region, select Use Existing GDSII, and then click on the three dots to select the GDSII file.

The FastXOR form displays; select the input GDS file: ./autoLib/i0mbfn000aa1d48x5/SPEF/i0mbfn000aa1d48x5.gds”.
After the setup, as mentioned above, the FastXOR form should look like Figure 64. Pegasus FastXOR* form - Input section
Keep the default settings in the Output section of the form: Pegasus FastXOR* form - Output section
In the FastXOR Options section, ensure nothing is enabled, and that no other options are specified. Cadence Pegasus FastXOR* - FastXOR Options section

Click Submit to run FastXOR. This opens a Cadence Pegasus* Report window. When the run completes, review the comparison (Figure 67). The Total DRC Results is 0, which means the comparison passed the check. FastXOR report
